extDescription.message: Chrome Extension to track the capital gain of the shares within the "We Share" operation.

sharesValueLabel.description: Name of the label for the value of the share.

sharesValueTitle.description: Tooltip for the share value input.

investmentValueLabel.description: Name of the label for the value of the investment.

investmentValueTitle.description: Tooltip for the value of the investment.

capitalGainLabel.description: Name of the label for the value of the capital gain.

capitalGainTitle.description: Tooltip for the capital gain input.

overallGainLabel.description: Name of the label for the value of the overall capital gain.

overallGainTitle.description: Tooltip for the overall gain input.

adobeHdsDownloaderTabLabel.description: Name of the Adobe HDS Downloader tab.

phpPathLabel.description: Name of the php command path label.

phpPathPlaceholder.description: Name of the php command path placeholder.

qualityLevelLabel.description: Name of the stream quality label.

qualityLevelPlaceholder.message: Select quality level or enter exact bitrate
qualityLevelPlaceholder.description: Name of the stream quality placeholder.

activateExtensionLabel.description: Name of the label of the option to activate the extension.

outputUrlOnlyLabel.message: Output only the manifest url into the clipboard.
outputUrlOnlyLabel.description: Name of the label of the option to output only the manifest url into the clipboard.

reviews.message: Rate this extension on the Chrome Web Store

closeModal.description: Label for the modal's close button.

numberOfUsers.description: Label for the number of users.
